item.title: CS135-lecture-20210307
item.description: Mergesort in Racket # Mergesort breaks the list in half and sorts each half recursively. Some pseudo: ms(list) front = front half of list back = back half of list ms(front) ms(back) return merge(front, back) In racket, there is a function called drop that takes a list and a number. It drops the numbers off the list. There is also take, that takes the first number of elements of the list and returns them.
